collection.title: Eucalyptus & Mint Sprays
collection.description: Refresh your space and clear your mind with our invigorating eucalyptus and mint sprays. Ideal for creating a clean, calming environment conducive to restful breathing.

products.title: Docteat Boost Sleep Spray Natural Sleep Aid with Herbal Extracts for Relaxation & Comfort Sleep
products.body_html:
Docteat Boost Sleep Spray Natural Sleep Aid with Herbal Extracts for Relaxation & Comfort Sleep

The Docteat Boost Sleep Spray is a natural sleep aid formulated with traditional Chinese medicine extracts, mint leaf, vitamin B1, and gluconic acid lactone. Designed to help you relax, reduce stress, and improve sleep quality, this convenient spray promotes deeper, restful nights. Ideal for home use or travel, it supports your bedtime routine with a natural, gentle approach.

Key Features:

  • Natural sleep aid with herbal and Chinese medicine extracts

  • Contains mint leaf extract for a calming effect

  • Enriched with vitamin B1 and gluconic acid lactone

  • Easy-to-use spray for quick and convenient application

  • Supports relaxation and promotes restful sleep

How to Use:

  • Shake well before use

  • Spray 2–3 times on your pillow or around your sleeping area

  • Inhale gently and relax to enjoy a restful night

Specifications:

  • Type: Boost Sleep Spray

  • Brand: Docteat

  • Ingredients: Traditional Chinese medicine extract, gluconic acid lactone, vitamin B1, potassium sorbate, mint leaf extract

  • Use: Sleep aid, relaxation, bedtime routine

  • Design: Portable, easy-to-use spray bottle

Why You'll Love It:

  • Natural ingredients for safe and gentle sleep support

  • Helps reduce stress and calm the mind

  • Convenient spray for home or travel

  • Promotes deeper, uninterrupted sleep

  • Supports overall relaxation and bedtime routine

Package Contents:

  • 1 x Docteat Boost Sleep Spray

products.title: XiMonth Lavender Sleeping Spray Relax Mind & Body 30ml for Restful Sleep & Relaxation
products.body_html:
XiMonth Lavender Sleeping Spray Relax Mind & Body 30ml for Restful Sleep & Relaxation

 

The XiMonth Lavender Sleeping Spray is designed to relax your mind and body, relieve stress, and promote restful sleep. Infused with lavender, chamomile, and eucalyptus extracts, this 30ml spray creates a soothing bedtime environment. Compact and easy to use, it’s perfect for home, travel, or office naps.

Key Features:

  • Relaxes mind and body for better sleep

  • Infused with lavender, chamomile, and eucalyptus extracts

  • Helps reduce stress and promote peaceful rest

  • Compact 30ml spray for convenient use

  • Ideal for home, travel, or bedtime routines

How to Use:

  • Shake well before use

  • Spray lightly on pillow, bedding, or room

  • Inhale gently and relax for a restful night

Specifications:

  • Type: Lavender Sleeping Spray

  • Brand: XiMonth

  • Ingredients: Water, glycerin, lavender extract, chamomile extract, eucalyptus leaf extract

  • Size: 2.8 x 2.8 x 11.3 cm

  • Volume: 30ml

  • Design: Compact, portable, easy-to-use spray

Why You'll Love It:

  • Soothes stress and supports relaxation

  • Promotes deeper and more restful sleep

  • Herbal extracts create a calming bedtime environment

  • Portable and convenient for home, office, or travel

  • Enhances your nightly self-care routine naturally

Package Contents:

  • 1 x XiMonth Lavender Sleeping Spray 30ml
